org.apache.bookkeeper.common.allocator.ByteBufAllocatorBuilder

  • Packages that use ByteBufAllocatorBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.common.allocator
    defines the utilities for allocator used across the project.
    org.apache.bookkeeper.common.allocator.impl
    Implements the utilities for allocator used across the project.

      Add a listener that is triggered whenever there is an allocation failure.
      ByteBufAllocatorBuilder ByteBufAllocatorBuilder.outOfMemoryPolicy​(OutOfMemoryPolicy policy)
      Define the OutOfMemory handling policy.
      ByteBufAllocatorBuilder ByteBufAllocatorBuilder.pooledAllocator​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator pooledAllocator)
      Specify a custom allocator where the allocation requests should be forwarded to.
      ByteBufAllocatorBuilder ByteBufAllocatorBuilder.poolingConcurrency​(int poolingConcurrency)
      Controls the amount of concurrency for the memory pool.
      ByteBufAllocatorBuilder ByteBufAllocatorBuilder.poolingPolicy​(PoolingPolicy policy)
      Define the memory pooling policy.
      ByteBufAllocatorBuilder ByteBufAllocatorBuilder.unpooledAllocator​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator unpooledAllocator)
      Specify a custom allocator where the allocation requests should be forwarded to.
